divs: sighting detailson december 12, 2011 around 6:30pm (est) i pulled up to my house (location moved to fi box) cms 12\13\11 09:19 cst flg, and as i was parking, i noticed lights falling from the sky, they fell fast, so im not sure what it was. they fell behind a neighbors house, i did not go investigate where they landed or if they vanished, however i did experience the event before but never reported it. about a month ago on november 8th around 11:40pm or so i was standing in line for the newly released call of duty modern warfare 3, and it was roughly about 20 minutes until the release, when i looked across the highway (649 clairton blvd ��� pleasant hills, pa 15122) right above the car dealership and saw several lights falling from the sky, and then vanished. i didnt know if i had saw what i thought i was seeing, but a girl in front of me saw the same thing as well. at that point i know i wasn't crazy. we had no idea what it was, or why the event occurred, im sure the has to be an explanation, possibly and probably something natural. there was nothing else visible in the sky on either night, no aircraft of any sort.

There were no other sightings in McKeesport on or around December 12th 2011
